commit message:
Better exception handling for Collection errors
Throw RuntimeException when Card.load() and Note.load() fail (anki Desktop code automatically throws an exception)
Change the error dialog which is shown when libanki exceptions are caught to give a more specific message depending on whether or not the onDatabaseCorrupt() hander was called
If collection doesn't exist then allow user to change path

Improve importing code
Fix bug where duplicate media files didn't work
Increase performance by up to 50%
Fix ShowcaseView appearing after tapping Add Deck

Merge pull request #713 from timrae/beta16Fixes

Beta16 fixes
